p: In a separate experiment, immunocompetent ferrets inoculated with influenza virus A/NL/16/98 were also treated with Oseltamivir, but only for 7 days. The levels of virus shedding from the nose and throat of these animals were similar to those of immunocompromised ferrets treated with Oseltamivir, as were the total amounts of viral RNA as calculated from the AUC ( S3 Fig).
